messages.content: 帮我找几张 明日方舟 m3 的图片，渲染出来

content.text: [ImageResult(url='https://gd-hbimg.huaban.com/0c97d53a94f333fad66ca70f32601d8c34c2d4db8f53e0-netl2f_fw658', title='', source='bing'), ImageResult(url='https://ts1.tc.mm.bing.net/th/id/R-C.db1a4364345d8b082d4de48cae32ae05?rik=rhE9iKxzhvwzDg', title='', source='bing'), ImageResult(url='https://gd-hbimg.huaban.com/a4b669d3e68da3ee91a12afe7a0bd689038bdc262aece-yasxcI_fw658', title='', source='bing'), ImageResult(url='https://ts1.tc.mm.bing.net/th/id/R-C.d9dc5fcd4b628e805d4b6a0edb0f9a48?rik=RiUbfVRpViaT%2fw', title='', source='bing'), ImageResult(url='https://gd-hbimg.huaban.com/205d12dbf22aec83ff34bd533616575f0939b561136c6-jwF7XH_fw658', title='', source='bing')]

1. **Bing**:
   - [Image 2](https://ts1.tc.mm.bing.net/th/id/R-C.db1a4364345d8b082d4de48cae32ae05?rik=rhE9iKxzhvwzDg)
